channel.title: Moving our stuff into the future Steam version?
channel.description:
Will we be able to load our saves into the Steam release?
When we load our saves into the Steam version, will our achievements propagate into Steam?

item.title: Moving our stuff into the future Steam version?
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
assuming the game version is the same, you SHOULD (I am not a developer. My word is not final. I do not actually know this is all in theory etc etc etc) be able to copy the save folder from the sourcemod version to the steam version without issue

Read full topic
item.source: Moving our stuff into the future Steam version?
